text: The pastries and tarts are still as amazing as I remember from my childhood (have been eating Delifrance pastries since I was a small kid). The pasta options are delicious and the soup of the day with the soup set (pumpkin soup) wowed me. The staff at this outlet are really warm and friendly as well, being patient to accomodate our requests with a smile. I love the modern European ambience of the place as well. Overall a great dining experience.

I repeatedly told the cashier that I am ordering a KIDS PASTA without chilli (I requested tomato base) for takeaway. I repeatedly told them it was for kids.
I don't mind the waiting time of 20 mins. But after waiting for so long, they still get my order wrong. I found out when I reached home.
I tried calling the branch phone number for resolution. Forever no one is manning the phone.
Date & Time: 3rd May 2025 @ 1.08pm

What sort of stingy business is this?!?! Just because I bought a takeaway is this how minimal the contents of your sandwiches are? Was this half a scoop? And the length of the baguette what the hell?!?

This is absolutely outrageous, this was on purchased on 12/1/2025 at 11:30am.
I will always visit the place. As now I'm the member I can get some discount and can redeem some item  foc. Tdy redeem free drink. That one way of attraction to customer. Keep it up.

Patient and friendly service

She even guide me where to add sugar to a freshly made ice lemon tea. I like it sugar free actually. Had the lunch pasta promo

Thank you! A great place to dine at with all the crowd at changi expo for event.
